display_name: Obstructive apnea (all desaturations) hypopnea (4% desaturation) index
description: Obstructive apnea hypopnea index  {[(total number of obstructive apneas) + (total number of hypopneas associated with >= 4% desaturation)] / (hours of sleep)}
calculations: 60*(hrembp4 +hrop4 + hnrbp4 + hnrop4 + oarbp +oarop + oanbp + oanop ) / slpprdp
